==Useful Info==
'''Polterguardians''' are support casters, which give passive [[repel missiles]] to all allies in their [[line of sight]]. They appear in [[the Vaults]] as a part of [[vault warden]] and [[ironbound preserver]] bands, but sometimes they spawn with just 1-2 random monsters.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you see a monster in [[the Vaults]] with the [[Repel Missiles]] effect, that means there's a polterguardian nearby.
*Polteguardians aren't much of a threat to melee characters, but [[Ranged Weapons]] users should take them out early so they have an easier time hitting other monsters. Casters should do the same if their main spells check [[EV]] (e.g. [[Bombard]] or [[Plasma Beam]]).
*Many AoE spells (e.g. [[Fireball]], [[Ozocubu's Refrigeration]], [[Irradiate]]) ignore EV and are not affected by [[Repel Missiles]].

==History==
*In [[0.32]], polterguardians were added to the game.
